com.mygdx.game

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyProjectile, PlayerProjectile

    public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    Projectile class creates its own body and calculates its velocity relative to the cursor click and the Player's position. After a certain time it will signify that it is ready for deletion, however it cannot delete itself and so must pass this information back up to the GameEngine so that it can delete it.
    Author:
    Sean Aubrey, Gabriel Fountain, Brandon Conn

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(float sourceX,
                  float sourceY,
                  float targetX,
                  float targetY,
                  float bulletDamage)
        Constructor that assigns passed values locally that will be used to calculate trajectory. Creates graphical and physical body objects.
        Parameters:
        sourceX - player's X coordinate in pixels.
        sourceY - player's Y coordinate in pixels.
        targetX - cursor's X coordinate in pixels.
        targetY - cursor's Y coordinate in pixels.
        bulletDamage - projectile's damage

    • Method Detail

      • buildBody

        public void buildBody(float sourceX,
                      float sourceY)
        Allows subclasses to build the body after modifying passed in data.
        Parameters:
        sourceX - Projectile's source x position.
        sourceY - Projectile's source y position.

      • calculateVelocity

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 calculateVelocity()
        Takes the differences in X and Y between the cursor click location and the player to calculate how much X and Y velocities should be used with respect to the Projectile's maximum velocity in order to angle the trajectory accurately. Formula to determine X + Y velocities: BF(n) = B(n/(n+1)) + B(1/(n+1)), where n is X/Y slope and B is max velocity.
        Returns:
        vel velocity

      • determineQuadrant

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 determineQuadrant()
        Determines which corner of the player to spawn the projectile to avoid intersecting with the player.
        Returns:
        vector signifying quadrant of player.

        Sets graphical object's position to a physical body's position.

      • deletable

        public boolean deletable(float time)
        Accumulates time until the despawn time is reached.
        Parameters:
        time - difference between frames.
        Returns:
        true if the projectile has been set for deletion

      • setDeletable

        public void setDeletable()
